entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
